reviewText: Very good information. Something valuable I learned is "Our bodies have to produce cells that are constantly being destroyed. It produces those cells with what we eat and drink." We are basically made out of what we eat and drink. Some people say we are what we eat. There's so many good tips on here to improve ones health. Be careful for false reviews. "A fan" keeps posting the same lies and two star rating on all of Dr. Hovinds products to get people to not watch them.
